resources.string: 1. Each round is a 1 v 1 match of Rock, Paper, Scissors against a computer controlled opponent
2. When a round begins, both players will begin with no throw and a countdown from 3 will begin
3. When the countdown reaches 0, you will be instructed to throw a move
4. At this point you will have 1 second to throw a Rock, Paper, or Scissors by selecting it on the screen
5. Rock beats Scissors. Scissors beats Paper. Paper beats Rock. Wins are indicated under each player\'s name
6. An early throw or no move throw will result in an illegal move and the player will lose the round. The computer will never make an illegal move
